function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic events impacting global economies","Impact":"Disruption of production, labor shortages, economic downturn","Mitigation":"Developing resilient supply chains, investing in automation, early detection and response plans","Technologies":"Automation technologies, AI-driven forecasting systems, robotics","People":"Global workforce, businesses, governments","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, businesses"},{"Description":"Unpredictability and exogeneity of pandemic events","Impact":"Inability to predict or prevent pandemic events","Mitigation":"Investing in public health infrastructure, global surveillance and monitoring, emergency response planning","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, public health surveillance systems, crisis management tools","People":"Global population, public health organizations, governments","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Loss of industry-level details due to country-level data analysis","Impact":"Lack of industry-specific insights, potential misinterpretation of data","Mitigation":"Supplementing with industry-level data, using alternative data sources, conducting qualitative industry research","Technologies":"Data aggregation tools, industry-specific surveys, qualitative research methods","People":"Researchers, industry analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research organizations, academic institutions, industry associations"}]}
